scripts.buildconsttree: node node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_buildconsttree.js -c build/fibonacci.const.bin -p src/fibonacci.pil -s src/starkstruct.json -t build/fibonacci.consttree.bin -v build/fibonacci.verkey.json
scripts.starkprove: node node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_prover.js -m build/fibonacci.commit.bin -c build/fibonacci.const.bin -t build/fibonacci.consttree.bin -p build/fibonacci.pil.json -s src/starkstruct.json -o build/fibonacci-proof.json -z build/fibonacci-proof.zkin.json -b build/fibonacci-public.json
scripts.starkverify: node node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_verifier.js -p src/fibonacci.pil -s src/starkstruct.json -v build/fibonacci.verkey.json -o build/fibonacci-proof.json -b build/fibonacci-public.json
scripts.plonkproof: snarkjs pkp build/fibonacci.zkey build/fibonacci.wtns build/fibonacci-proof.json build/fibonacci-public.json
